text: Daniel Mendes de Matos, known as Dani Matos (born 15 May 1983) is a Portuguese football player who plays for CD Alcains. ==Club career== He made his professional debut in the Segunda Liga for Sporting Covilhã on 24 August 2008 in a game against Desportivo das Aves. ==References== ==External links== *Dani Matos at ZeroZero Category:1983 births Category:People from Castelo Branco, Portugal Category:Living people Category:Portuguese footballers Category:Sport Benfica e Castelo Branco players Category:S.C. Covilhã players Category:LigaPro players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Dani Matos
